48 // defined
49 #ifndef VERBOSE
50 #define DEBUG(__out__) ;
51 #else
52 #define DEBUG(__out__) std::cout << __out__;
53 #endif

55 namespace Mutation {
56  namespace Utilities {
57 
61 static std::string prependPath(
62  const std::string& dir, const std::string& file)
63 {
64  // For an empty directory string, return the file name only
65  if (dir.length() == 0)
66  return file;
67 
68  // Check if the separator is already appended on the directory name
69  const char sep = GlobalOptions::separator();
70  if (dir[dir.length()-1] == sep)
71  return dir + file;
72  else
73  return dir + sep + file;
74 }
75 
81 static std::string appendExtension(
82  const std::string& name, const std::string& ext)
83 {
84  // For an empty extension, return the file name as is
85  if (ext.length() == 0)
86  return name;
87 
88  // Check if period character is already included
89  if (ext[0] == '.')
90  return name + ext;
91  else
92  return name + '.' + ext;
93 }
94 
107 static std::string databaseFileName(
108  std::string name, const std::string& dir, const std::string& ext = ".xml")
109 {
110  // Add extension if necessary
111  if (name.length() < ext.length() + 1 ||
112  name.substr(name.length()-ext.length()) != ext)
113  name = appendExtension(name, ext);
114 
115  // Check the working directory first
116  std::string path = prependPath(GlobalOptions::workingDirectory(), name);
117  if (std::ifstream(path.c_str(), std::ios::in).is_open())
118  return path;
119 
120  // Check the working directory with assumed folder hierarchy
121  path = prependPath(GlobalOptions::workingDirectory(), dir);
122  path = prependPath(path, name);
123  if (std::ifstream(path.c_str(), std::ios::in).is_open())
124  return path;
125 
126  // Check data directory
127  path = prependPath(GlobalOptions::dataDirectory(), name);
128  if (std::ifstream(path.c_str(), std::ios::in).is_open())
129  return path;
130 
131  // If we didn't find it there then just return path with data directory and
132  // assumed folder hierarchy
133  path = prependPath(GlobalOptions::dataDirectory(), dir);
134  return prependPath(path, name);
135 }
136 
140 static const char* ordinalSuffix(int n)
141 {
142  switch (n%100) {
143  case 11: case 12: case 13: return "th";
144  default:
145  switch (n%10) {
146  case 1: return "st";
147  case 2: return "nd";
148  case 3: return "rd";
149  default:
150  return "th";
151  }
152  }
153 }
